K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207a-1: a'arya mee tri ya pa ri pri tstsh'a n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207a-3: 'phags pa byams pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207a-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207a-6: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207a-7: dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207a-8: byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207a-10: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @207b chen po byams pa stan las langs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-1: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-2: bcom ldan 'das ga la der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-3: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-4: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-7: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-9: byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-10: dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te khyad par thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:207b-16: bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-2: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-3: 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-4: yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-5: gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-9: byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa khyod yang legs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-11: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-14: de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te khyad par thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-20: bdud kyi phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-0: @208b chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-1: yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-2: gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-6: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-7: sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-8: gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-9: yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin; byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-10: snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-14: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-16: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-17: bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:208b-19: bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-0: bsngags pa ma yin pa thos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges @209a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-3: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-5: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-7: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-8: ma byin par len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-9: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-13: tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-15: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-17: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-18: byams pa; 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge sbyong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-21: slong ba rnams la gos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-25: yo byad rnams gtong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-26: sbyin pa dag tu gyur ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-28: de lta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209a-30: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-0: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni @209b lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang ci yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-1: de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-2: byams pa; de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-4: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-6: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-7: byams pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-8: byams pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-10: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-12: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-14: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnod sems med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa yin; gnod sems med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-15: gnod sems med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-17: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:209b-19: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-0: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems @210a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-1: dpa' chen po ni kun rdzob kyi don la mkhas pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-2: dam pa'i don la mkhas pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-3: gnyi ga'i don la mkhas pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-5: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-7: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-9: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-13: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-14: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-15: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-16: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug; skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-17: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-18: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-19: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-20: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-21: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba; skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210a-27: de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210b-1: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210b-2: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210b-3: ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210b-4: skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210b-10: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210b-16: de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur snyam pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210b-18: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210b-21: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210b-22: mi nyams la yongs su mi nyams te khyad par thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210b-23: bdud phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:210b-24: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs nas 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-0: yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur @211a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-1: nas kyang gzhan gyi kha na ma las pa'i ye shes kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-5: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-9: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-11: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-12: byams pas zhus pa chos brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-13: 'dus pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-14: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-16: zhu chen gyi lo tstsh'a ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-007:211a-17: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa ////
